South_San_Francisco.Sunnydale station: Sunnydale Station is an island platform light rail station of the San Francisco Municipal Railway's Muni Metro system located in the median of Bayshore Boulevard at Sunnydale Avenue in Visitacion Valley, San Francisco, California. This is the terminal for the T Third Street Muni Metro line and is also the first local-fare boarding point for SamTrans routes 292 and 397 southbound. Possible longer-range plans will extend this line along Geneva Avenue to the Cow Palace and the Muni hub at Balboa Park Station to meet with J Church, K Ingleside and M Ocean View at this terminus and together to form circular routes.
